entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
